question.name: study001_comparison
question.summary: Find genes which are differentially expressed during Primitive or Definitive erythropoiesis.
question.description:
Find genes which are differentially expressed during Primitive or Definitive erythropoiesis or between equivalent cell stages in comparisons among the different erythroid lineages.

These data come from the %%study001_name%% study.

First choose an experiment, then choose your reference and alternative conditions. Comparisons within lineages were made between successive stages of erythroid development, with earlier stages serving as the reference for the later ones. Comparisons between lineages were made with either Primitive or Fetal Definitive Erythropoiesis as the reference condition.

Choose the directionality and the magnitude of the (raw) fold difference.
For example, selecting up-regulated with a fold difference of 2 will only show results where the expression level of the comparator is twice that of the reference.

If a comparison returns no result with a high-confidence filter, rerun setting the confidence value to 'Any'.


Differential expression analysis was performed using the standalone PaGE (Patterns from Gene Expression) non-parameteric test of differential expression (see Manduchi et al. Bioinformatics. 2000; PMID: 11099255).

Using this approach, p-value significance is qualified by a false discovery rate-based confidence level. Comparisons supported by an FDR <= 0.2 are considered to have "high-confidence".

columnAttribute.name: fold_change
columnAttribute.help: fold change based on the ratio of raw mRNA expression levels

columnAttribute.name: reference_mean
columnAttribute.help: mean mRNA expression level for the reference condition

columnAttribute.name: alternative_mean
columnAttribute.help: mean mRNA expression level for the alternate, comparison condition

columnAttribute.name: is_confident
columnAttribute.help: FDR passes confidence cutoff for the comparison (usually FDR less than 20%)

columnAttribute.name: fdr
columnAttribute.help: permutation based estimate of the false discovery rate

question.name: study001_expression
question.summary: Find genes expressed during Primitive or definitive erythropoiesis.
question.description:
Find genes by ranked expression levels in the %%study001_name%%.

Select a lineage and one or more developmental stage.

columnAttribute.name: sample
columnAttribute.help: sample associated with top-ranked expression (out of selected samples in search)

columnAttribute.name: percentile
columnAttribute.help: ranked percentile across all genes expressed in this condition for the experiment

columnAttribute.name: mean_expression
columnAttribute.help: mean log2 mRNA expression level for the selected condition

columnAttribute.name: standard_error
columnAttribute.help: standard error on the mean log2 expression
